text: Hello, I see $15 incorrect charge on my bill, please help.
suggested_response: We apologize for the inconvenience. We'll review the $15 charge and get back to you shortly.

text: App crashes with error 502 when I hit Submit.
suggested_response: Thank you for reporting this. Our technical team will investigate the error 502 and resolve it as soon as possible.

text: I forgot my password and need a reset link.
suggested_response: We've sent a password reset link to your registered email address.

text: Thanks for the quick support yesterday!
suggested_response: You're welcome! We're always here to help.
